<title level="1" right="Trait">[Bulwark](/Traits.aspx?ID=202)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 274 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

The armor covers you so completely that it provides benefits against some damaging effects. On Reflex saves to avoid a damaging effect, such as a _[fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119)_, you add a +3 modifier instead of your Dexterity modifier.
